    Simulate a Hidden Markov Model based on Poisson-gamma data

    hmm_simulate_poisgamma_data.Rd

    Simulate a Hidden Markov Model based on Poisson-gamma data

    hmm_simulate_poisgamma_data(L, mat_T, betas, alpha)

    Arguments

    L

    (integer) number of simulations

    mat_T

    (matrix) a square matrix with the initial state

    betas

    (numeric) rate parameter in rgamma for emission probabilities

    alpha

    (numeric) shape parameter in rgamma for emission probabilities

    Value

    returns a data vector "data", the "true" hidden states "states" used to generate the data vector and prior probability of states "pi".

    Examples

    mat_T <- rbind(c(1-0.01,0.01,0),
               c(0.01,1-0.02,0.01),
               c(0,0.01,1-0.01))
L <- 2^10
betas <- c(0.1, 0.3, 0.5)
alpha <- 1

sim_data <- hmm_simulate_poisgamma_data(L = L,
                                        mat_T = mat_T,
                                        betas = betas,
                                        alpha = alpha)
hist(sim_data$data, breaks = 100, main = "Histogram")
